UX Review

Whether you’re building a brand-new website or developing your next revolutionary mobile app, you have to know whether your work will actually provide users with the experience you hope to give them. You also have to know whether your product is a good fit, both for the market and for your own goals. That’s where an expert UX review comes to your rescue – and Brightscout can conduct it for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Let’s Get Started” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#5DE455″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#14C0AA” button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”64px||” custom_padding=”20px|72px|20px|72px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”center_left” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

what do your customers think?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A Critical Analysis of User Experience and Behavior

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ max_width=”8%” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”24px||32px” animation_style=”slide” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A UX (user experience) review is a comprehensive examination of the usability of your brand’s website or digital product. It’s an evaluation to determine how well the design adheres with certain heuristics, or basic rules of thumb, regarding user behaviors and market expectations. You could conduct extensive user research to gain this knowledge, but connecting with users can be a frustrating, costly, time-consuming process. Brightscout’s UX experts can run through product or site through its paces much more quickly, efficiently, and cost-effectively.

Design sprints play an important role in the Brightscout UX review process. Originally developed by Google for its internal teams, this methodology combines the most effective qualities of various UX review practices into a flexible framework. A design sprint can compress the entire UX review process into a productive 5-day cycle of testing design ideas, hypotheses, and prototypes. Our UX reviews can evaluate how intuitive, appealing, simple and easy to understand your product or website’s interface and content are for your intended users.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” module_class=”rv_button closed” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#54B454″ button_bg_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0)” button_border_color=”#54b454″ button_letter_spacing=”1.25px” button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”40px||” custom_padding=”16px|40px|16px|40px” animation_style=”zoom” button_text_size_last_edited=”off|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_size__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#54b454″ button_text_size__hover=”14px” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/right-bg6.svg” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_right” custom_padding=”58px|0px|20px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]
